attributes.action: stop embarrassing the electorate of this country by appearing on Sky News and talking about the democratic process in other parts of the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an affront and deeply offensive to the electorate of this country to have to listen to Gordon Brown, on television, talking about the democratic process elsewhere in the world when he has single-handedly done more than any other person, living or dead, including Adolf Hitler and Robert Mugabe in their own countries, to damage the democratic process in his own country.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
